description: This file defines a Java interface acting as a repository for User entities, extending Spring Data JPA's JpaRepository and including a custom method to find users by email.

classes.name: UserRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for User entities, providing basic CRUD operations and a custom method to locate users by email.

methods.name: findByEmail
methods.description: Retrieves an Optional containing the User with the specified email, if such a user exists.
